      • getStateEvents

        public java.util.List<Event> getStateEvents(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> types)
        Provides the loaded states event list. The room member events are NOT included.
        Parameters:
        types - the allowed event types.
        Returns:
        the filtered state events list.

      • getStateEvents

        public void getStateEvents(IMXStore store,
                           java.util.Set<java.lang.String> types,
                           SimpleApiCallback<java.util.List<Event>> callback)
        Provides the state events list. It includes the room member creation events (they are not loaded in memory by default).
        Parameters:
        store - the store in which the state events must be retrieved
        types - the allowed event types.
        callback - the asynchronous callback.

      • getDisplayableMembers

        Provides a list of displayable members. Some dummy members are created to internal stuff.
        Returns:
        a copy of the displayable room members list.

      • isConferenceUserRoom

        public boolean isConferenceUserRoom()
        Tells if the room is a call conference one i.e. this room has been created to manage the call conference
        Returns:
        true if it is a call conference room.

      • applyState

        public boolean applyState(IMXStore store,
                          Event event,
                          EventTimeline.Direction direction)
        Apply the given event (relevant for state changes) to our state.
        Parameters:
        store - the store to use
        event - the event
        direction - how the event should affect the state: Forwards for applying, backwards for un-applying (applying the previous state)
        Returns:
        true if the event is managed

      • isPublic

        public boolean isPublic()
        Returns:
        true if the room is a public one
